biotools.summary: DomainViz allows users to identify and visualize protein domains on one or more protein sequences using multiple domain prediction platforms (Pfam and Prosite) to understand the consensus positionality and abundance of different domains within protein groups and families.

bioschemas.name: DomainViz
bioschemas.summary: DomainViz allows users to identify and visualize protein domains on one or more protein sequences using multiple domain prediction platforms (Pfam and Prosite) to understand the consensus positionality and abundance of different domains within protein groups and families.
